00022 #ifndef STEAMPROPERTY_H
00023 #define STEAMPROPERTY_H
00024 
00025 #include "steamcalculator.h"
00026 
00027 #ifndef NDEBUG
00028 #include <sstream>
00029 #include "exception.h"
00030 #endif
00031 
00033 
00038 template<class Property,int PropertyAlternative=0>
00039 class SteamProperty{
00040         public:
00041                 static inline Property get(const SteamCalculator &S);
00042                 static const char *name();
00043 };
00044 
00045 // 'getProperty' hooks
00046 
00047 inline SpecificEnergy
00048 SteamProperty<SpecificEnergy,SOLVE_IENERGY>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00049         return S.specienergy();
00050 }
00051 
00052 inline SpecificEnergy
00053 SteamProperty<SpecificEnergy,SOLVE_ENTHALPY>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00054         return S.specenthalpy();
00055 }
00056 
00057 inline Density
00058 SteamProperty<Density,0>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00059         return S.dens();
00060 }
00061 
00062 inline SpecificVolume
00063 SteamProperty<SpecificVolume,0>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00064         return S.specvol();
00065 }
00066 
00067 inline Temperature
00068 SteamProperty<Temperature,0>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00069         return S.temp();
00070 }
00071 
00072 inline Pressure
00073 SteamProperty<Pressure,0>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00074         return S.pres();
00075 }
00076 
00077 inline SpecificEntropy
00078 SteamProperty<SpecificEntropy,SOLVE_ENTROPY>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00079         #ifndef NDEBUG
00080                 try{
00081         #endif
00082 
00083         return S.specentropy();
00084 
00085         #ifndef NDEBUG
00086                 }catch(Exception *E){
00087                         std::stringstream s;
00088                         s << "SteamProperty<s>::get: " << E->what();
00089                         delete E;
00090                         throw new Exception(s.str());
00091                 }
00092         #endif
00093 }
00094 
00095 inline SpecHeatCap
00096 SteamProperty<SpecHeatCap,SOLVE_CP>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00097         return S.speccp();
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline SpecHeatCap
00101 SteamProperty<SpecHeatCap,SOLVE_CV>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00102         return S.speccv();
00103 }

00105 inline Num
00106 SteamProperty<Num,0>::get(const SteamCalculator &S){
00107         return S.quality();
00108 }
